## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking. # K 5 PREMIUM SMART CONTROL FLEX ## Text Für mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Smart Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole, für starke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. ## Description The image shows a pressure washer with a modern design, primarily in yellow and black colors. The main unit has a compact, upright structure with large wheels for mobility. It features a prominent handle at the top for easy transportation. The pressure washer includes a hose reel at the back for convenient storage of the hose. ### Key Features: - **Color Scheme**: Predominantly yellow with black accents. - **Design**: Upright and compact, designed for easy maneuverability. - **Handle**: Located at the top, facilitating transport. - **Wheels**: Large and sturdy, enhancing mobility. - **Hose Reel**: Positioned at the back for efficient hose management. ### Accessories: - **Spray Gun**: Detachable and shown separately in the image, matching the color scheme of the main unit. This pressure washer is likely designed for home or light commercial use, offering convenience and efficiency in cleaning tasks. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-732.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529122742 - **Stromart**: V / Hz: 230 / 50 - **Druck**: bar / MPa: 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5 - **Fördermenge**: l/h: max. 500 - **Flächenleistung**: m²/h: 40 - **Zulauftemperatur**: °C: max. 40 - **Anschlussleistung**: kW: 2.1 - **Anschlusskabel**: m: 5 - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: kg: 13.5 - **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: kg: 17 - **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: mm: 417 × 306 × 584 ## Ausstattung
Ausstattung Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [ ]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [ ]
HD-Schlauch m: 10 / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [ ]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [ ]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a star and a column, which is part of the Guinness World Records logo. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters. This section has a gold background, emphasizing the achievement of holding a world record. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Detailed Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements: - A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, positioned on the left side of the image. - To the right of the numeral, there is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. - Inside the yellow arrow, the text reads: - "WORLD'S NO. 1" at the top, in bold black uppercase letters. - Below that, "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" is written, also in bold black uppercase letters. The design suggests a focus on ranking or status, emphasizing the brand's position as the leading pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of bold text and bright colors is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trust. ## Description of the Figure The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality. The stars are arranged in a circle, symbolizing unity and harmony among European countries. The overall appearance is simple and professional, conveying a sense of trust and reliability. ## Description The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest a wireless signal or communication, indicating concepts such as connectivity, signal transmission, or mobile communication. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the idea of a smartphone emitting a signal. ## Description of Figure The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the following elements: - **Header**: "LANGLEBIG" is displayed at the top in a gray box. - **Icon**: Below the header, there is a yellow hourglass icon. - **Text**: Underneath the icon, the text "AUSDAUERNDES STANDGERÄT" is present in white on a black background. This figure appears to be a label or a logo, possibly indicating durability or endurance, as suggested by the hourglass symbol and the accompanying text. The use of color and design elements suggests an emphasis on longevity or reliability.

## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The use of bold typography and contrasting colors makes the logo easily recognizable and visually striking.

## Text

Für mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Smart Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole, für starke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet.

## Description

The image shows a pressure washer with a modern design, primarily in yellow and black colors. The main unit has a compact, upright structure with large wheels for mobility. It features a prominent handle at the top for easy transportation. The pressure washer includes a hose reel at the back for convenient storage of the hose.

### Key Features:

- **Color Scheme**: Predominantly yellow with black accents.
- **Design**: Upright and compact, designed for easy maneuverability.
- **Handle**: Located at the top, facilitating transport.
- **Wheels**: Large and sturdy, enhancing mobility.
- **Hose Reel**: Positioned at the back for efficient hose management.

### Accessories:

- **Spray Gun**: Detachable and shown separately in the image, matching the color scheme of the main unit.

This pressure washer is likely designed for home or light commercial use, offering convenience and efficiency in cleaning tasks.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-732.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten - **EAN-Code**: 4066529122742 - **Stromart**: V / Hz: 230 / 50 - **Druck**: bar / MPa: 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5 - **Fördermenge**: l/h: max. 500 - **Flächenleistung**: m²/h: 40 - **Zulauftemperatur**: °C: max. 40 - **Anschlussleistung**: kW: 2.1 - **Anschlusskabel**: m: 5 - **Farbe**: gelb - **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: kg: 13.5 - **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: kg: 17 - **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: mm: 417 × 306 × 584 ## Ausstattung
Ausstattung Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [ ]

HD-Schlauch m: 10 / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergekühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [ ]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [ ]

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a star and a column, which is part of the Guinness World Records logo.

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capitalized letters. This section has a gold background, emphasizing the achievement of holding a world record.

The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Detailed Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements:

- A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, positioned on the left side of the image.
- To the right of the numeral, there is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right.
- Inside the yellow arrow, the text reads:
  - "WORLD'S NO. 1" at the top, in bold black uppercase letters.
  - Below that, "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" is written, also in bold black uppercase letters.

The design suggests a focus on ranking or status, emphasizing the brand's position as the leading pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of bold text and bright colors is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trust.

## Description of the Figure

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality. The stars are arranged in a circle, symbolizing unity and harmony among European countries. The overall appearance is simple and professional, conveying a sense of trust and reliability.

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest a wireless signal or communication, indicating concepts such as connectivity, signal transmission, or mobile communication. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the idea of a smartphone emitting a signal.

## Description of Figure

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the following elements:

- **Header**: "LANGLEBIG" is displayed at the top in a gray box.
- **Icon**: Below the header, there is a yellow hourglass icon.
- **Text**: Underneath the icon, the text "AUSDAUERNDES STANDGERÄT" is present in white on a black background.

This figure appears to be a label or a logo, possibly indicating durability or endurance, as suggested by the hourglass symbol and the accompanying text. The use of color and design elements suggests an emphasis on longevity or reliability.
